analysis.jd_summary: schema_version='v1' must_have=['software development', 'data infrastructure', 'data platforms', 'Apache Iceberg', 'Apache Flink', 'Trino/Presto', 'cloud computing', 'distributed systems'] nice_to_have=['Apache Spark', 'Docker', 'Kubernetes', 'DevOps', 'cloud architecture'] responsibilities=['design data lakehouse components', 'lead architecture sessions', 'ensure quality and performance', 'evaluate new technologies', 'mentor junior engineers'] seniority='senior'
analysis.resume_ast: schema_version='v1' sections=[Section(id='section_1', name='PROFILE'), Section(id='section_2', name='SKILLS'), Section(id='section_3', name='WORK EXPERIENCE'), Section(id='section_4', name='INTERNSHIPS'), Section(id='section_5', name='EDUCATION')] roles=[Role(id='role_1', section_id='section_3', title='Software Engineer', company='CentrAlert', date_range='06/23 - Present'), Role(id='role_2', section_id='section_3', title='Software Development Engineer', company='Tata Consultancy Services', date_range='07/19 - 07/21'), Role(id='role_3', section_id='section_3', title='Software Engineering Intern', company='CAMP Systems International', date_range='05/22 - 08/22'), Role(id='role_4', section_id='section_3', title='Peer Tutor, Data Science', company='University of Massachusetts at Lowell', date_range='10/21 - 01/22')] bullets=[Bullet(id='bullet_1', role_id='role_1', text='Designed and scaled a distributed backend system for an emergency communications platform serving 100,000+ users, using .NET (C# 9.0+), Python, and SQL Server; architected REST and gRPC APIs, reducing end-to-end latency by 40% and enabling seamless third-party integrations.'), Bullet(id='bullet_2', role_id='role_1', text='Optimized multithreaded backend services through advanced task scheduling, thread pooling, and concurrency tuning in .NET, increasing system throughput by 30% and reducing peak-time processing latency by 25%.'), Bullet(id='bullet_3', role_id='role_1', text='Engineered a real-time, low-latency search capability leveraging Elasticsearch, Kafka, and Debezium, achieving sub-second data indexing and rapid retrieval of critical alerts under high-load production conditions.'), Bullet(id='bullet_4', role_id='role_2', text='Engineered and optimized high-performance PostgreSQL and SQL Server databases by tuning complex queries, implementing B-Tree and Hash indexes, and applying table partitioning, reducing query latency by 40% and boosting system scalability by 30% under production load.'), Bullet(id='bullet_5', role_id='role_2', text='Automated database cluster provisioning, version upgrades, and seamless migrations using Python, Ansible, Terraform, and Docker, integrating with Jenkins CI/CD pipelines to cut deployment times by 50% and ensure zero-downtime releases across cloud environments.'), Bullet(id='bullet_6', role_id='role_2', text='Designed and deployed distributed database architectures (PostgreSQL, Redis) incorporating replication, sharding, and fault-tolerant configurations, achieving 99.99% uptime and a 3x improvement in high-concurrency transaction throughput.'), Bullet(id='bullet_7', role_id='role_3', text='Designed and implemented a unified Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) system using Identity Server and OAuth 2.0 for the CAMP Engine Maintenance suite, reducing client authentication issues by 40% and strengthening application security layers.'), Bullet(id='bullet_8', role_id='role_3', text='Optimized application-to-database mapping with Entity Framework (C#/.NET), integrated PostgreSQL for scalable data management, and leveraged AWS S3 for object storage, improving horizontal scalability to efficiently handle increased user loads.'), Bullet(id='bullet_9', role_id='role_3', text='Developed and automated unit testing suites using XUnit in C#, contributing to a 20% reduction in critical production issues and enhancing deployment confidence.'), Bullet(id='bullet_10', role_id='role_4', text='Tutored graduate students in Data Science and Machine Learning concepts using Python, R, Scikit-Learn, and TensorFlow, designing tailored learning materials and contributing to academic success for a cohort of 30+ students.')] skills_buckets={'Programming Languages': ['Python', 'Golang', 'C#', 'C++', 'Java', 'JavaScript', 'SQL'], 'Frameworks & Libraries': ['.NET Core', 'Entity Framework', 'React.js', 'Node.js', 'Django', 'Flask', 'TensorFlow'], 'Databases': ['PostgreSQL', 'MySQL', 'SQL Server (MSSQL)', 'MongoDB', 'Cassandra', 'Redis'], 'Cloud & DevOps': ['AWS', 'Azure', 'Docker', 'Kubernetes', 'Terraform', 'Snowflake'], 'Messaging & Data Systems': ['Kafka', 'Elasticsearch', 'gRPC', 'Debezium'], 'Tools & Practices': ['Git', 'Jenkins', 'CI/CD pipelines', 'Agile methodologies', 'XUnit'], 'Software Engineering': ['System Design', 'Distributed Systems', 'Real-time Data Pipelines', 'Performance Tuning', 'System Optimization', 'Production Incident Management'], 'Soft Skills': ['Problem Solving', 'Critical Thinking', 'Communication', 'Teamwork', 'Adaptability']}
analysis.improvement_plan: schema_version='v1' edits=[ModifyBullet(type='modify_bullet', bullet_id='bullet_1', new_text='• Designed and scaled a distributed backend system for an emergency communications platform serving 100,000+ users, using .NET (C# 9.0+), Python, and SQL Server; architected REST and gRPC APIs, reducing end-to-end latency by 40% and enabling seamless third-party integrations.'), InsertBullet(type='insert_bullet', role_id='role_1', after_bullet_id='bullet_2', text='• Evaluated and implemented new data technologies including Apache Iceberg, Apache Flink, and Trino/Presto to enhance the data lakehouse architecture, improving data ingestion, processing, and querying capabilities.'), InsertBullet(type='insert_bullet', role_id='role_1', after_bullet_id='bullet_3', text='• Led architecture design sessions with cross-functional teams to ensure the data lakehouse components met performance, scalability, and reliability requirements, mentoring junior engineers on best practices.'), ModifyBullet(type='modify_bullet', bullet_id='bullet_4', new_text='• Engineered and optimized high-performance PostgreSQL and SQL Server databases by tuning complex queries, implementing B-Tree and Hash indexes, and applying table partitioning, reducing query latency by 40% and boosting system scalability by 30% under production load.'), InsertBullet(type='insert_bullet', role_id='role_2', after_bullet_id='bullet_5', text='• Designed and deployed cloud-based data infrastructure using AWS and Azure services, including S3, Redshift, and Snowflake, to create a scalable and fault-tolerant data lakehouse architecture.'), ModifyBullet(type='modify_bullet', bullet_id='bullet_6', new_text='• Designed and deployed distributed database architectures (PostgreSQL, Redis) incorporating replication, sharding, and fault-tolerant configurations, achieving 99.99% uptime and a 3x improvement in high-concurrency transaction throughput for mission-critical applications.'), InsertBullet(type='insert_bullet', role_id='role_3', after_bullet_id='bullet_8', text='• Developed and deployed containerized microservices using Docker and Kubernetes, integrating with CI/CD pipelines to enable rapid, reliable, and scalable application deployments across cloud environments.'), UpsertSkill(type='upsert_skill', bucket='Technical Skills', value='Apache Spark'), UpsertSkill(type='upsert_skill', bucket='Technical Skills', value='DevOps'), UpsertSkill(type='upsert_skill', bucket='Technical Skills', value='Cloud Architecture')] constraints=PlanConstraints(max_bullets_per_role=8, forbid_fabrication=True)
